name: Captcha Kills
description: It's the modern day Turing Test where players pretend to be AI to deceive others into believing they aren't human. Voices are disguised and players are given rounds to identify and eliminate others who they suspect are human. The game is built to test your ability at deceiving others into believing you aren't human and your ability to tell the difference between AI and Human. It’s a race to identify the other sentient beings before you get identified first. The game is cross-platform enabled, connecting virtual reality with flatscreen in a seamless fashion.
